lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer in North America is fast-tracking plans to use video reviews to aid referee decisions, commissioner Don Garber said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: MLS Wants to Be 'Guinea Pig' for Video Reviews
headline.main: MLS Wants to Be 'Guinea Pig' for Video Reviews

snippet: Major League Soccer in North America is fast-tracking plans to use video reviews to aid referee decisions, commissioner Don Garber said on Thursday....
